text: KV42 is a tomb in Egypt's Valley of the Kings. The tomb was constructed for Hatshepsut-Meryetre, the wife of Thutmose III. She was not buried in the tomb. It was reused by Sennefer, a mayor of Thebes. Category:Buildings and structures in Ancient Egypt Category:2nd millennium BC buildings and structures Category:Tombs Category:Luxor Governorate
title: KV42
